title: Guide to Peaceful Coexistence
summaries: The Guide to Peaceful Coexistence is a tool that combines the effects of the Guide To Critter Companionship and the Guide to Environmental Preservation, preventing player attacks from harming critters and breaking plants. It is not an accessory and will work as long as it is in the player's main inventory.
After pressing âš· Open / Activate on it in the inventory or hotbar, it will turn into the Guide to Peaceful Coexistence (Inactive), temporarily disabling its effects.
